article_title: The Washington Times honors the fallen heroes of every generation
article_text:
On this Memorial Day, The Washington Times honors the fallen heroes from every war and every generation.

It also salutes all those who have returned from the battlefield: the heroic, the wounded and the scarred, as well as our home-front heroes who have dedicated their lives to helping heal our veterans and Wounded Warriors.

If you want to show your support, here are three simple ways:
